mapper.select: SELECT app_id, app_name, login_name, password, login_type, last_update FROM app WHERE app_id = #{id}
SELECT app_id, app_name, login_name, password, login_type, last_update FROM app WHERE app_name LIKE '%' + #{id} + '%';
SELECT app_id, app_name, login_name, password, login_type, last_update FROM app ORDER BY app_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app (app_name, login_name, password, login_type, last_update) VALUES (#{appName}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{loginType}, #{lastUpdate});
mapper.update: UPDATE app SET app_name = #{appName}, login_name = #{loginName}, password = #{password}, login_type = #{loginType}, last_update = #{lastUpdate} WHERE app_id = #{appId};
